plurals.doc: Estimated wait time value in minutes displayed in the Minimized View and Fullscreen View
plurals.name: chat_estimated_wait_time_minutes

plurals.doc: Content description for the unread message count displayed on the Minimized View.
plurals.name: chat_minimized_unread_message_count
plurals.item: %2$s からの %1$d 件の未読メッセージ

string.doc: Content description for agent avatar
string.name: agent_has_joined_conference_avatar_description

resources.string: グループ会議エージェント

string.doc: Message text (including %1$s agent name and %2$s current time) that is shown to users when an additional agent has joined an existing chat session
string.name: agent_has_joined_conference_message

resources.string: %1$s さんがチャットに参加しました - %2$s

string.doc: Message text (including %1$s agent name and %2$s current time) that is shown when an agent has left an existing group conference chat session
string.name: agent_has_left_conference_message

resources.string: %1$s さんがチャットを離れました - %2$s

string.doc: String read out by a screen reader when the agent starts typing
string.name: agent_is_typing

resources.string: 文字数制限を超えています（%1$d/%2$d 文字）

string.doc: Message text shown to users in a banner when they reconnect during a chat session
string.name: chat_connection_banner_connected_text

string.doc: Message text shown to users in a banner when they are disconnected during a chat session
string.name: chat_connection_banner_disconnected_text

resources.string: 接続に問題があります。そのままお待ちください。

string.doc: The connection lost banner text.
string.name: chat_connection_lost_banner_text

string.doc: The message in the dialog presented to the user when they attempt to end the chat session.
string.name: chat_dialog_end_session_message

resources.string: チャットセッションを終了しますか?

string.doc: The positive button text shown in the End Session confirmation dialog.
string.name: chat_dialog_end_session_positive

string.doc: The title of the dialog presented to the user when they attempt to end the chat session.
string.name: chat_dialog_end_session_title

string.doc: The negative button text shown in the End Session confirmation dialog.
string.name: chat_dialog_negative

string.doc: Menu option displayed to the user that lets them take a photo with their camera and send it to the agent.
string.name: chat_dialog_select_image_source_camera

string.doc: Menu option displayed to the user that lets them choose a photo from their phone's photo gallery app to send to the agent.
string.name: chat_dialog_select_image_source_choose

string.doc: Menu option displayed to the user that lets them send the last photo they took with their camera to the agent.
string.name: chat_dialog_select_image_source_last_photo

resources.string: 最後に撮った写真を使用

string.doc: Content description for buttons that will end the chat session if pressed.
string.name: chat_end_session_content_description

resources.string: チャットセッションを終了

string.doc: Content description for the chat feed view.
string.name: chat_feed_content_description

resources.string: チャットメッセージはこちらに表示されます

string.doc: The toolbar title text that is visible on the chat feed.
string.name: chat_feed_title

string.doc: Message displayed to the user in the Chat Feed when a file transfer has been cancelled by the agent.
string.name: chat_file_transfer_canceled

resources.string: ファイル転送がキャンセルされました

string.doc: Message displayed to the user in the Chat Feed when a file transfer has been completed.
string.name: chat_file_transfer_completed

resources.string: ファイルは移動されました

string.doc: Message displayed to the user in the Chat Feed when a file transfer has failed.
string.name: chat_file_transfer_failed

resources.string: ファイル転送が失敗しました

string.doc: Message displayed to the user in the Chat Feed when the agent has requested a file transfer from the user.
string.name: chat_file_transfer_requested

resources.string: ファイル転送が要求されました

string.doc: Content description applied to the chat session footer menu at the bottom of the Chat Feed.
string.name: chat_footer_menu_button_content_description

resources.string: チャットセッションオプションを表示

string.doc: Content description applied to the footer menu collapse button on the chat bot footer menu.
string.name: chat_footer_menu_collapse_content_description

resources.string: メニューを折りたたむ

string.doc: Label text displayed at the top of the chat bot footer menu.
string.name: chat_footer_menu_header_label

string.doc: The status text description on the Fullscreen View while the session is attempting to connect to the server.
string.name: chat_fullscreen_connecting_description

resources.string: チャットを縮小表示するには最小化アイコンを使用します

string.doc: The status text description on the Fullscreen View when the session has been disconnected.
string.name: chat_fullscreen_connecting_disconnected_description

resources.string: チャットを閉じて後でもう一度お試しください

string.doc: The status text title on the Fullscreen View when the session has been disconnected.
string.name: chat_fullscreen_connecting_disconnected_title

string.doc: The status text description on the Fullscreen View when the session connecting has encountered an error.
string.name: chat_fullscreen_connecting_error_description

resources.string: オンラインであることを確認してください

string.doc: The status text title on the Fullscreen View when the session connection has encountered an error.
string.name: chat_fullscreen_connecting_error_title

string.doc: Content description for the fullscreen chat minimize connecting icon.
string.name: chat_fullscreen_connecting_minimize_content_description

string.doc: The status text title displayed on the Fullscreen View while the session is attempting to connect to the server.
string.name: chat_fullscreen_connecting_title

string.doc: Displayed in the fullscreen view when the estimated wait time is longer than the maximum estimated wait time.
string.name: chat_fullscreen_queued_ewt_long

resources.string: 待ち時間が予想より長くなっています。

string.doc: Displayed in the fullscreen view when the estimated wait time is unknown.
string.name: chat_fullscreen_queued_ewt_short

resources.string: エージェントが空き次第お繋ぎいたします。

string.doc: The queued status text title on the Fullscreen View when the session is queued and estimated wait time is unknown or very large.
string.name: chat_fullscreen_queued_ewt_text_alternative_title

resources.string: そのままお待ちください...

string.doc: The queued status text description on the Fullscreen View when the session is queued and estimated wait time is displayed in minutes.
string.name: chat_fullscreen_queued_ewt_text_description

resources.string: エージェントが空き次第お繋ぎいたします。

string.doc: The queued status text title on the Fullscreen View when the session is queued and estimated wait time is displayed in minutes.
string.name: chat_fullscreen_queued_ewt_text_title

string.doc: The queued status text description on the Fullscreen View when the session is queued.
string.name: chat_fullscreen_queued_text_description

resources.string: エージェントが空き次第お繋ぎいたします。

string.doc: The queued status text title on the Fullscreen View when the session is queued.
string.name: chat_fullscreen_queued_text_title

string.doc: Message displayed to the user when Chat has failed to load a photo from their photo gallery app.
string.name: chat_image_selection_failed

resources.string: 写真を読み込めません

string.doc: Displayed to the user when their message could not be delivered.
string.name: chat_message_delivery_failed

resources.string: メッセージは送信されませんでした

string.doc: Displayed to the user in the Chat feed when they have sent a message in violation of Sensitive Data Rules and their text has been modified.
string.name: chat_message_modified

resources.string: メッセージから機密データが削除されました

string.doc: Displayed to the user when their message could not be delivered because it violates Sensitive Data Rules.
string.name: chat_message_not_sent_privacy

resources.string: 機密データが含まれているため、メッセージは送信されませんでした

string.doc: The Notification Channel ID used when posting notifications to inform the user that a message has been received from the chat agent. Used on devices running Android Oreo and later. Not translatable.
string.name: chat_message_notification_channel_id

string.doc: The name of the Notification Channel used when posting notifications to inform the user that a message has been received from the chat agent. Used on devices running Android Oreo and later.
string.name: chat_message_notification_channel_name

string.doc: Content description for the Minimize action menu item that is shown on the Chat Feed Activity.
string.name: chat_minimize_content_description

string.doc: The status text displayed on the Minimized View while the session is attempting to connect to the server.
string.name: chat_minimized_connecting

string.name: chat_minimized_post_session

resources.string: セッションは終了しました

string.doc: The status text displayed on the Minimized View while the user is waiting for an agent to join the session.
string.name: chat_minimized_queued

string.name: chat_minimized_queued_ewt_long

resources.string: 待ち時間が長くなっています

string.doc: Displayed in the fullscreen view when the estimated wait time unknown.
string.name: chat_minimized_queued_ewt_short

resources.string: エージェントを待機中

string.doc: The estimated wait time status text displayed on the Minimized View while the user is waiting for an agent to join the session.
string.name: chat_minimized_queued_ewt_title

string.doc: Message displayed to the user when the user has denied permission to access their camera or photos.
string.name: chat_permission_not_granted

resources.string: 権限が付与されていません

string.doc: First line of error message displayed to the user if an error occurs launching the chat message feed.
string.name: chat_resume_error_string

string.doc: Second line of error message displayed to the user if an error occurs launching the chat message feed.
string.name: chat_resume_error_string_subtext

resources.string: 不明なエラーによりチャットリクエストが失敗しました。もう一度お試しください。

string.doc: The message text displayed on the Chat Service notification. This text is visible in the Android notification bar when a Chat session is active.
string.name: chat_service_description

resources.string: エージェントとチャット中です

string.doc: The name of the Notification Channel used when posting the foreground service notification used by Chat on devices running Android Oreo and later.
string.name: chat_service_notification_channel_name

string.doc: The title text displayed on the Chat Service notification. This text is visible in the Android notification bar when a Chat session is active.
string.name: chat_service_title

string.doc: Message displayed to the user when an agent transfer is in progress.
string.name: chat_session_button_transfer_initiated

resources.string: エージェントに転送しています

string.name: chat_session_ended_by_agent

resources.string: エージェントがセッションを終了しました

string.doc: Message displayed to the user when an agent joins the chat.
string.name: chat_session_transferred_to_agent

resources.string: %1$s さんがチャットに参加しました

string.doc: Message text shown to the user when no agents are available for a chat session.
string.name: chatbot_transfer_no_agents_available_message

resources.string: 申し訳ありません!\n対応できるエージェントがいません。

string.name: chatbot_transferring_cancel_button_text

string.name: chatbot_transferring_connecting_message

string.name: chatbot_transferring_toolbar_title

string.doc: Open Graph URL standard text for knowledge article hyperlink preview
string.name: hyperlink_preview_knowledge_article_url_title

resources.string: ダイアログ アイコン
午前または午後を選択
時刻を選択してください
時刻を時計で入力するモードに切り替えます。
時刻をテキストで入力するモードに切り替えます。
日付を選択してください
期間を選択してください
カレンダー入力モードに切り替え
タップすると、日の選択に切り替わります
テキスト入力モードに切り替え
タップすると、年の選択に切り替わります
